decisions.description: Depending on the product line, send relevant pre-training email automatically (AUS Only)
decisions.name: Pre_training_email_needed
decisions.label: Pre-training email needed? (AUS Only)

Flow.description: Flow modified to remove automated Connect Pre-training email

formulas.description: Is the newly created resource a Connect Presenter?
formulas.name: ConnectPresenter
CountryCode
formulas.expression: IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Business_Unit__c} , "Elevate Australia"),"AU", IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Business_Unit__c} , "Elevate UK"),"GB", IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Business_Unit__c} , "Elevate USA"),"US", IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Business_Unit__c} , "Elevate South Africa"),"ZA", "SG"))))

formulas.description: Is the newly created resource an Elevate Presenter or not?
formulas.name: ElevatePresenter
PrimaryRegion
formulas.expression: IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Business_Unit__c} , "Elevate Australia"),{!Get_Candidate_details.Position__r.Job_Region__r.Id}, IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Business_Unit__c} , "Elevate UK"),{!Get_Candidate_details.Position__r.Job_Region__r.Id}, IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Business_Unit__c} , "Elevate USA"),{!Get_Candidate_details.Position__r.Job_Region__r.Id}, IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Business_Unit__c} , "Elevate South Africa"),"a196F00000DaFp7QAF", "a196F00000DaDfiQAF"))))

formulas.description: Default Primary region for Resource when presenter user is manually created
formulas.name: PrimaryRegionWithoutAppl
formulas.expression: IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Business_Unit__c} , "Elevate Australia"),"a196F0000095VbFQAU", IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Business_Unit__c} , "Elevate UK"),"a196F00000DaDXoQAN", IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Business_Unit__c} , "Elevate USA"),"a196F00000Da8J4QAJ", IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Business_Unit__c} , "Elevate South Africa"),"a196F00000DaFp7QAF", "a196F00000DaDfiQAF"))))

formulas.description: Is the newly created resource an Elevate Coach?
formulas.name: StudentCoach

formulas.description: Combine user address details into one variable that can be passed on to Resource Home address.
formulas.name: UserHomeAddress

formulas.description: Working with Children detail copied from Applicant to Resource
formulas.name: WWC

Flow.label: USER AutoLaunch RunAfter CreatedOnly ONBOARD RESOURCE

textTemplates.name: OnboardingEmail
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.FirstName},


Congratulations on joining Elevate Education and welcome to the team!!


We're so excited to have you on board! Just a few things to do before you start:


You will need to complete some new employee forms and provide info such as banking details, a TFN number, super information, a reference to contact, etc. It's pretty standard stuff, but we need this so we can pay you (exciting!). You'll also need to upload some supporting documents such as a Working With Children Check and 100 points of ID.


After this, you will need to read and accept a number of company policies and procedures. They are important documents, so take the time to read and understand what we expect from you before you digitally accept to follow these guidelines.


Please be aware that this personalised link is private and confidential. It provides access to all of your private information. So, please do not share this link with anyone. Ready to get started?!? Click here to complete your Onboarding process.


Login details:

Username: {!Username}

Password: {!Password}


The final step is to prepare for training. We will send another email with training information to help you know what to expect and how to set yourself up for success.


If you need help at any time, contact our team at jobs@elevateeducation.com or call 1300 667 945.


Regards,

Elevate Education

textTemplates.name: OnboardingEmailUK
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.FirstName},


Congratulations on joining Elevate Education and welcome to the team!!


We're so excited to have you on board! Just a few things to do before you start:


You will need to complete some new employee forms and provide info such as banking details, National Insurance number, a reference to contact, etc. It's pretty standard stuff, but we need this so we can pay you (exciting!). You'll also need to upload some supporting documents such as DBS and Proof of Identity.


After this, you will need to read and accept a number of company policies and procedures. They are important documents, so take the time to read and understand what we expect from you before you digitally accept to follow these guidelines.


Please be aware that this personalised link is private and confidential. It provides access to all of your private information. So, please do not share this link with anyone. Ready to get started?!? Click here to complete your Onboarding process.


Login details:

Username: {!Username}

Password: {!Password}


The final step is to prepare for training. We will send another email with training information to help you know what to expect and how to set yourself up for success.


If you need help at any time, contact our team at recruitment@elevateeducation.com or call 01865 980 269.


Regards,

Elevate Education

Dear {!$Record.FirstName},


Congratulations on joining Elevate Education and welcome to the team!!


We're so excited to have you on board! Just a few things to do before you start:


You will need to complete some new employee forms and provide info such as banking details, a reference to contact, etc. It's pretty standard stuff, but we need this so we can pay you (exciting!). You'll also need to upload some supporting documents such as Proof of Identity.


After this, you will need to read and accept a number of company policies and procedures. They are important documents, so take the time to read and understand what we expect from you before you digitally accept to follow these guidelines.
